<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Corpse Tender's Font](/Feats.aspx?ID=3885) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #181: Zombie Feast](/Sources.aspx?ID=139) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Corpse Tender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=196)

**Prerequisites**
[Corpse Tender Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3883)

</column>

---

You easily tend to the wounds of the dead. You can cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) as a divine innate spell once per day. This spell is heightened to half your level, rounded up. You can target only [mindless](/Traits.aspx?ID=108) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) with this spell.
